mapper.select: SELECT F.FACILITY_COPNO,F.FACILITY_REQUESTDATE,F.FACILITY_STARTDATE,F.FACILITY_ENDDATE,F.FACILITY_STATUS, F.PASS_COUNT,F.FACILITY_NO,F.FACILITY_NAME,F.FACILITY_AREA,F.FACILITY_SECTION,F.FACILITY_ADDRESS,F.FACILITY_EVENT, F.FACILITY_MANAGER_NAME,F.FACILITY_MANAGER_PHONE,F.TIME_FOR_CALL,F.MON_FRI_TIME,F.SAT_TIME,F.SUN_TIME,A.ATT_NO, A.FILE_NO,A.UPLOAD_NAME,A.FILE_TYPE,A.REF_NO FROM FACILITY F JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(F.FACILITY_NO=A.REF_NO) WHERE A.FILE_TYPE=6 AND FILE_NO=0

SELECT FACILITY_COPNO,FACILITY_REQUESTDATE,FACILITY_STARTDATE,FACILITY_ENDDATE,FACILITY_STATUS, PASS_COUNT,FACILITY_NO,FACILITY_NAME,FACILITY_AREA,FACILITY_SECTION,FACILITY_ADDRESS,FACILITY_EVENT, FACILITY_MANAGER_NAME,FACILITY_MANAGER_PHONE,TIME_FOR_CALL,MON_FRI_TIME,SAT_TIME,SUN_TIME,ATT_NO, FILE_NO,FILE_TYPE,UPLOAD_NAME,REF_NO FROM (SELECT F.FACILITY_COPNO,F.FACILITY_REQUESTDATE,F.FACILITY_STARTDATE,F.FACILITY_ENDDATE,F.FACILITY_STATUS, F.PASS_COUNT,F.FACILITY_NO,F.FACILITY_NAME,F.FACILITY_AREA,F.FACILITY_SECTION,F.FACILITY_ADDRESS,F.FACILITY_EVENT, F.FACILITY_MANAGER_NAME,F.FACILITY_MANAGER_PHONE,F.TIME_FOR_CALL,F.MON_FRI_TIME,F.SAT_TIME,F.SUN_TIME,A.ATT_NO, A.FILE_NO,FILE_TYPE,A.UPLOAD_NAME,A.REF_NO FROM FACILITY F JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(F.FACILITY_NO=A.REF_NO) WHERE F.FACILITY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{facilityName}||'%' or F.FACILITY_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{facilityAddress} || '%' or F.FACILITY_EVENT LIKE '%' || #{facilityEvent} || '%') WHERE FILE_NO=0 AND FILE_TYPE=6

SELECT F.FACILITY_COPNO,F.FACILITY_REQUESTDATE,F.FACILITY_STARTDATE,F.FACILITY_ENDDATE,F.FACILITY_STATUS, F.PASS_COUNT,F.FACILITY_NO,F.FACILITY_NAME,F.FACILITY_AREA,F.FACILITY_SECTION,F.FACILITY_ADDRESS,F.FACILITY_EVENT, F.FACILITY_MANAGER_NAME,F.FACILITY_MANAGER_PHONE,F.TIME_FOR_CALL,F.MON_FRI_TIME,F.SAT_TIME,F.SUN_TIME,A.ATT_NO, A.FILE_NO,FILE_TYPE,A.UPLOAD_NAME,A.REF_NO FROM FACILITY F JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(#{facilityNo}=A.REF_NO) WHERE F.FACILITY_NO=#{facilityNo} AND A.FILE_NO=0

SELECT F.FACILITY_COPNO,F.FACILITY_REQUESTDATE,F.FACILITY_STARTDATE,F.FACILITY_ENDDATE,F.FACILITY_STATUS, F.PASS_COUNT,F.FACILITY_NO,F.FACILITY_NAME,F.FACILITY_AREA,F.FACILITY_SECTION,F.FACILITY_ADDRESS,F.FACILITY_EVENT, F.FACILITY_MANAGER_NAME,F.FACILITY_MANAGER_PHONE,F.TIME_FOR_CALL,F.MON_FRI_TIME,F.SAT_TIME,F.SUN_TIME,A.ATT_NO,F.FACILITY_AREA, F.FACILITY_SECTION, A.FILE_NO,FILE_TYPE,A.UPLOAD_NAME,A.REF_NO FROM FACILITY F JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(#{facilityNo}=A.REF_NO) WHERE F.FACILITY_NO=#{facilityNo}
